test_module.name: test_us49035_ts3_vcpu_scale_up_down/${WASS_TC_NAME}
test_module.test_case:
####################################################### # Test Sanity CGCS app/test #######################################################
CALL env
SET SETTING_FILE /home/wrsroot/test_setting.cnf SET PORT_CONTROLLER ${port_controller} SET PORT_COMPUTER ${port_compute} SET PORT_STORAGE ${port_storage}
LOOKFOR TYPE \n SINK 1 SEC PROMPTTIMEOUT 600 SEC PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con1SSH PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con1 PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con2 PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s)
SET CR } SET CL {
# generic expect-lite call CALL ${WASSP_TC_PATH}/${WASSP_TC_NAME}.elt HOST_IP=$env.NODE.target.default.targetIP *NOINTERACT $rt_log
PASS
